casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Kadeem KIRK. No. 40P16. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 17, 2016. Mark Montgomery, for Kirk, Kadeem. Kathleen N. Bolton, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. William R. West, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 8th of February 2016 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of March 2016."
